CAREER:
Matthew is a career long software engineer.  He specializes in C/C++ Linux applications.  See his site at http://www.dynamic-memory.com
Learn more about Matthew's career?  %[Education](postback:education) %[Positions](postback:positions) %[Recent](postback:recent)
EDUCATION: Matthew holds a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from The Ohio State University
POSITIONS:
Matthew has had software engineering positions of increasing responsiblity including Developer, Architect, Team Lead and Manager
He has run his own consulting business for over 25 years.
RECENT: Matthew is CEO of DMS Software.  DMS Software offers custom software services for Telecom, Finance and Retail companies.
LANGUAGES: Matthew is a C/C++ expert with a strong grasp on Java, Perl, Python, JavaScript, JSP, and PHP.  He dabbles in Objective-C, Swift and Scala.
ROBOT: This robot is a mashup of Smooch, Heroku, GitHub, JavaScript and JSON. You can make your own with no coding! It is based on a robot by Esther Crawford and team. See https://github.com/matthewericfisher/EstherBot
SPECIALTIES: Matthew is a performance, latency and scalability specialist.  He has Architected massive telecommuntion system that handle billions of transactions a day.  He has designed Wall Street system with microsecond latency.  Designing and implementing for performance are second nature.
INTERESTS: Matthew is interested in all things related to software.  Beyond that he is a passionate chess player and family man
TELL HIM: Let's tweet @ Esther so she knows you're setting a bot up. Here's a tweet that's ready to go: %[Tweet Esther](http://bit.ly/estherbot-tweet)
